snippet: For Cincinnati manager Dusty Baker, a mini-stroke and a return in the playoffs to San Francisco, the city where he once managed, have reminded him just how quickly time passes.
abstract: Cincinnati Reds manager Dusty Baker, on the heels of a mini-stroke, returns to California for Reds division series against San Francisco Giants, a franchise he managed for 10 years.
lead_paragraph: For Cincinnati manager Dusty Baker, a mini-stroke and a return in the playoffs to San Francisco, the city where he once managed, have reminded him just how quickly time passes.

headline.seo: Health Scare Gives Reds’ Dusty Baker New Perspective
headline.main: After Scare, Baker Looks Between the Milestones
headline.print_headline: After Scare, Baker Looks Between the Milestones
